flawed_nl_solution:
So the total number of streetlights that will be used is 15 squares * 12 streetlights/square = <<15*12=108>>108 streetlights
There will be 200 streetlights - 108 streetlights = <<200-108=92>>92 streetlights unused.
#### 92

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
